Class Timer

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
Timer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
class Timer
extends java.lang.Thread
Timer iterates a counter every second to track the amount of time that the thread has been active. BuildGameController informs BuildGameModel to get and store the second count from Timer. BuildGameController then accesses the stored timer data to inform BuildGameView to update its timer button.
Author:
Larry Chiem, Ian Rowe, Raymond Shum, Nicholas Stankovich

  • Method Details

    • resetTimer

      public int resetTimer()
      Starts the timer if it is off and if it is on, stops the timer by setting a boolean value to false, breaking a loop in the thread.
      Returns:
      int value representing total number of iterations
